name: HKCLUF Crossbody Bags for Women Designer Leather Hobo Handbags With 2 Adjustable Leopard Guitar Strap Shoulder Bucket Bags
reviews: So I've been carrying a travel organizer bag for about 6 years, the same one because I do a lot of travel and it seemed too difficult to empty and put it in a new purse.  One day I felt I needed a change!  I searched forever for the right bag and kept coming back to this one.  I got the A10-Dark Brown and it is absolutely a stunning bag.  My phone fits perfectly into the front magnet pocket, and I have no problems hearing it ring.  It also holds one 16 oz water bottle, my big cosmetic bag, a charging accessories bag, glasses case for sunglasses, wallet and small credit card wallet fits exactly into the zippered compartment inside. There are plenty of pockets to keep certain items secure also.It's the perfect mix of style and functionality!  The material is luxurious and soft but firm, the bag has structure and holds it's shape.  It will stand up on it's own.  The "leather" is a bit slick which I had to get used to but not too bothersome now.  The straps are so gorgeous on the bag I bought and I've had dozens of compliments on the bag and even just the straps.  The straps are made of a very thick high-quality fabric.  One of the straps has a sheen, the other is more textured.  I think it is amazing we have two strap choices.  The patterns on the straps are beautiful, and this one is more boho style which I love.  The straps can be adjusted on the fly, and so easy to adjust you won't have to take the bag off to do that.  I've never worn a cross body and thought I would probably just use it as a shoulder purse, but the cross body is so easy and wow, the freedom of my hands being able to open doors and not have to hang on to my purse is extra nice!  The color of the bag itself is a beautiful grain.  The branding isn't obnoxious at all and I don't even notice it.  It is not a heavy purse, and for this I'm grateful.  I can't say I'm easy on my purse but the "leather" is very forgiving and does not show scratches or bends.  Quality stitching which looks like it will hold up for a very long time.  The color of the bag looks exactly as depicted in the photos on the listing.The bag opens wide enough to see inside, which is a plus and I don't find that my items shift as I carry the bag.  The zipper is my only gripe though not enough to lower the 5 star.  The middle closure zipper is recessed about an inch or so and has to be unzipped all the way to look in.  This is why the zipper is so long and has a "tail" that needs to be folded down or tucked in.  The zipper has a gap on either end of the zipper but that isn't bad really, odd but not bad.  It is a little tough to get started zipping, and it will need two hands, one holding either end of the zipper, but nothing I am concerned about with the zipper other than my own preferences.Should you buy it?  Only if you need an amazing new bag that will rock your daily needs and travel too!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 17 July 2023

date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 18 March 2024

name: HKCLUF Crossbody Bags for Women Designer Leather Hobo Handbags With 2 Adjustable Leopard Guitar Strap Shoulder Bucket Bags
reviews: Other reviews that I saw not one mentioned the zipper & that's one of the reasons I'm disappointed (the main reason) & one major hindrance. 1st off it's a little small even with downsizing my stuff comfortably but there's a few good points even with that. The front pocket with the snap is really a good size which is a plus. The magnet is good once u line it up together but I got use to doing that. It is well made from the looks of it so far & the purple is a very soft shade very calming. That's another plus. The cross body straps are made really well & I like the purplish color one best. It matches good & the other is nice too. A plus again. The inside lining is made good & doesn't gap up but isn't too tight & a nice light color. A plus too. There's lots of pluses & every woman is different on the size desires. I can make the size work cuz I downsized & rearranged how I set up stuff inside. It's this terrible zipper. The end that hangs down has to stay inside the corner end of the purse if u don't want it to hinder the ability to close w/out tugging & snagging. It's a bad hassle. Once u get it inside the purse on the corner end where the end gap is u have to grab both sides of the purse to close it & what woman wants that hassle w/the zipper? I don't. Otherwise it's a pretty good purse. Was overnighted in delivery. I'm gonna order a more stable kind next mo till then I'll deal w/it. Hopefully I can practice it where it's a bit easier to deal with. It has a few pluses but a major minus. U can pull it open wide to get your stuff but u can't fill it full where it bulks out cuz it's designed to lay & close flat to zip once u can master this horrible zipper if @ all. Don't recommend it cuz of the zipper but otherwise if u don't carry alot yes I recommend it. Not gonna return it cuz that's a hassle I'll deal w/it & find a better one a bit bigger. Ordering online is always a chancy thing. This is an update on the zipper that may help the ppl who have zipper issues like me & another reviewer I saw :: I was messing around with it trying to figure out the easiest way for a simple way (till I order my better & bigger one) & this trick may help others to fix their closing issue. Don't know if this is really how it's gotta be done or if it's my own idea. Take the end long part of the zipper that's pushed inside & leave it in the open then grab the end & pull it up slightly & then zip it (hope that's not confusing) & when u pull it up you'll know how much pull to give it. Now mine zips. It's the only way I found. Hope this helps
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 11 February 2024

name: HKCLUF Crossbody Bags for Women Designer Leather Hobo Handbags With 2 Adjustable Leopard Guitar Strap Shoulder Bucket Bags
reviews: By far the best work bag I have ever owned!! I've been thru several bags in the last few months trying to find one that works best for me. This one is perfect! It's roomy and holds all my stuff (tablet, 2 notebooks, wallet, pouch with pens and keys and other small items) with ease without being too big and floppy. The outside open pocket for phones and glasses is perfect and the outside zipper pocket is great for my IDs, business cards and hand sani. The extra strap is great so I can change the look of the bag easily! The best part is that it's lightweight and isn't burdensome to carry.

name: HKCLUF Crossbody Bags for Women Designer Leather Hobo Handbags With 2 Adjustable Leopard Guitar Strap Shoulder Bucket Bags
reviews: I like the purse but it said white and it is an off white to tannish color.Also I had gotten a black one just like it and that one had a tassel on the side so I was assuming this one would too. Would like it much better if the tassel was on it. It was attached at the same place that you attach the strap so it could be taken on and off. Also a nice touch to these purses would be to have a solid color strap the same color as the pocketbook because some outfits would look better with a solid color. Overall the purse is good quality. I think though listing it as white was very misleading. Also can’t understand why one would have the tassel and the other one not
